featured.text: The Tuck family has discovered a spring whose water brings eternal life.
Mrs. Tuck kills the man and is jailed and sentenced to be executed.

definition.zh_def: 把某物塞進或折疊起來以便於存放或隱藏。
definition.en_def: To push, fold, or insert something into a particular place for storage or concealment.
definition.example: She decided to tuck the blanket neatly under the mattress.
